Download explanation: Uxwebhu lwakho lulungile ngoku, sikuthumela nange-imeyile
Subject: Isihloko
closed:
##siyabulela kubaxhasi abayi-{{total}}!

Sikuvalile esi senzo, kodwa umsebenzi wethu awupheli apha, ngoko ke sicela **ushiye i-imeyile yakho ukuze uhlale unolwazi malunga namanyathelo alandelayo**

consent.confirm: <0>Uqinisekile?</0><1>Ukuba ukhetha 'Hayi', awuyi kukwazi ukufumanisa ukuba lo mkhankaso uphumelele, okanye ukuba kukho elinye inyathelo esimele silithathe kunye ukuze siphumelele. Ukuba ukhetha 'Ewe' siya kukugcina ulwazi malunga nalo mkhankaso kunye neminye emikhankaso yethu ephuthumayo.</1><2>Ungazikhupha nanini na.</2>
consent.confirmAction:
Nceda ufunge i-imeyile ngoku kwaye ucofe kwikhonkco elikuqulethe (jonga kwifolda yakho ye-spam!).
 Kungoko kuphela xa isenzo sakho siza kubalwa!
Ukuqinisekisa kwakho kubalulekile ukuze esi senzo sibe nobunzima kwezopolitiko. Oku kuqinisekisa ukuba kukho umntu owenyani ngasemva kwezinto zonke ezithunyelweyo. Siza kulinda ukuqinisekisa kwakho...
consent.confirmOptIn: Ungakulibali ukujonga ibhokisi yakho leposi (kubandakanywa ifolda ye-spam!) kwaye uqinisekise ukubhaliswa kwakho kwe-imeyile
consent.implicit: Thumela le fomu ukuze ufumane i-imeyile ezivela ku-{{name}}
consent.intro: Fumanisa okungakumbi malunga nemikhankaso yethu, izenzo kunye nenkqubela phambili ye-{{campaign}}
consent.opt-in: Ewe, ndifuna u-{{partner}} andigcine ndinolwazi nge-imeyile
consent.opt-in-both: Ewe, ndifuna u-{{partner}} no-{{lead}} bandigcine ndinolwazi nge-imeyile
consent.opt-out: Hayi, ungandithumeli i-imeyile okanye ungagcini ndinolwazi kwixesha elizayo
consent.processing: Ulwazi lwakho lobuqu luya kugcinwa luyimfihlo kwaye luphephile. Ngokuthumela ulwazi uvuma ukusetyenziswa kwedatha kunye nekuki ngokwe-<1>nkqubo yethu yobumfihlo</1>
consent.processing-nocookie: Ulwazi lwakho lobuqu luya kugcinwa luyimfihlo kwaye luphephile. Ngokuthumela ulwazi uvuma ukusetyenziswa kwedatha ngokwe-<1>nkqubo yethu yobumfihlo</1>
consent.required: Imvume yakho iyadingeka ukuze uthathe inxaxheba

image.benefit: Ukudibanisa umfanekiso wokuthumela - onokuthi wabelane ngawo kwisinyathelo esilandelayo - kuya kwenza isenzo sakho sibe nefuthe elikhulu

reminder.intro: Siyazi, urhulumente wakho ucelwa ulwazi oluninzi. Siza kukuthumela i-imeyile enye ukukukhumbuza ukuba ugcwalise ifomu kamva
